p: Consistent with our observations in human 293T cells ( Fig. 3), the knockdown of murine Dicer (mDicer-KD) rescued the viral RNA accumulation and virion production of DENV2 K135A in either WT or Ifnar1 −/− MLFs ( Fig. 4, A and B). These data further confirm the rescuing effect of the loss of Dicer on VSR-deficient DENV2 and indicate that it is not attributed to IFN-I. In addition, the production of vsiRNAs was dependent on the presence of mDicer in both WT and Ifnar1 −/− MLFs as expected ( Fig. 4C, lanes 6 and 12).
